name: 陳省三
objective: 本課程教導學生瞭解智慧財產權與專利管理，課程的教導將朝下列方向進行：（1）智慧財產權基本觀念與實務，（2）專利資訊分析，（3）專利演化與發展，（4）創意產出，（5）專利申請與保護， (6)專利佈局，（7）專利侵權鑑定，（8）專利迴避設計，（9）案例分析。
schedule:
Week 1-2: Basic knowledge and practices of Intellectual Property Rights
Week 3-4: The analysis of patent information
Week 5-6: The evolution and development for patent
Week 7-8: Innovative idea generation
Week 9-10: Application and protection of patent
Week 11-12: Patent strategy
Week 13-14: Patent violation
Week 15-16: Patent avoidance
Week 17-18: Cases study

Week 1-2: 智慧財產權基本觀念與實務

scorePolicy:
期末考 20%
期中考 20%
作業與案例研討 40%
課程參與 (思考並參與討論) 20%
